resources.string: Has it been less than 30 min since notified to fill out survey?
Thank you. Your answers have been recorded.
In general, would you be interested in meeting someone new right now?
Right now, would you be interested in meeting someone who shares this attribute with you:
Why are you interested in this right now? Select all that apply.
Why are you NOT interested in this right now? Select all that apply.
1. What kind of place are you in right now?
2. How social is this place right now? (Enter approx. number)
3. How rare do you think is [ATTRIBUTE] right now?
4. How familiar are you with people nearby?
5. How crowded is it right now?
6. How involved are you in an activity right now?
7. How regularly are you at this place?
